title:
Remainder terms of $L^p$-Hardy inequalities with magnetic fields: the
  case $1<p<2$
abstract:
This paper focuses on remainder estimates of the magnetic $L^p$-Hardy
inequalities for $1<p<2$. \emph{Firstly}, we establish a family of remainder
terms involving magnetic gradients of the magnetic $L^p$-Hardy inequalities,
which are also new even for the classical $L^p$-Hardy inequalities.
\emph{Secondly}, we study another family of remainder terms involving
logarithmic terms of the magnetic $L^p$-Hardy inequalities. \emph{Lastly}, as a
byproduct, we further obtain remainder terms of some other $L^p$-Hardy-type
inequalities by using similar proof of our main results.
  Furthermore, this paper answers the open question proposed by Cazacu \emph{et
al.} in [\emph{Nonlinearity} \textbf{37} (2024), Paper No. 035004] and can be
viewed as a supplementary work of it.
